objective: Ship an impeccable multi-session agent command center for daily and overnight operations.

team.title: Program Orchestrator
team.mission: Own roadmap, gating, and execution sequencing across all agent teams.

team.title: Runtime Reliability
team.mission: Keep fleet manager healthy and attention queue under strict control.

team.title: Repo Hygiene
team.mission: Prevent drift and dirty-tree entropy across active projects.

team.title: Operator Experience
team.mission: Reduce command friction and improve response speed in manager views.

team.title: Quality and Safety
team.mission: Harden error handling and guardrails for long unattended runs.
team.kpi: No critical regressions from command upgrades.

team.title: Loop Automation
team.mission: Turn manual checks into repeatable program loops and reports.
team.kpi: All loop reports generated on cadence with clear next actions.

loops.goal: Detect attention spikes and session health regressions quickly.
Keep dirty-tree growth bounded and visible.
Fix top failure mode from current signals and close with validation.
Promote readiness gates and ship one measurable improvement.

phases.name: Operational Hardening
definition_of_done: fleet manager runs reliably for full workday
attention queue remains <= 1 for most cycles

phases.name: Impeccable UX
definition_of_done: fleet and drift outputs are readable at a glance
operator can jump to any session quickly

phases.name: Autonomous Loops
definition_of_done: program loop emits actionable report each run
overnight behavior is bounded and observable

phases.name: Impeccable Product
definition_of_done: fleet attention remains <= 1 without constant manual babysitting
